name: CrossWS
description: Cross-platform WebSocket Servers for Node.js, Deno, Bun and Cloudflare Workers.

landing.heroDescription: One code for Node.js, Deno, Bun and Cloudflare Workers!

features.title: Runtime Agnostic
features.description: Seamlessly integrates with Bun, Deno, Cloudflare Workrs and Node.js (ws or uWebSockets.js)

features.title: Made for Performance
features.description: High-performance server hooks API designed to avoid creating callbacks per client but once.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Zero Dependency with bundled ws for Node.js support. Extremely lightweight and tree-shakable packaging with ESM and CJS support.

features.title: Developer Friendly
features.description: Typed Hooks API and human friednly logging support.
